subtitle: Chicken portions are cooked in a tomato sauce with the spicy zing of cayenne pepper in this easy recipe.

method.text: Wash the chicken pieces. Dry. Rub with lemon juice.
Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Fry the chicken for 5-10 min or until browned. Remove with a slotted spoon. Set aside. Keep warm.
Add the garlic, onions, tomatoes, tomato puree and cayenne pepper to the pan. Fry for 2-3 min, stirring regularly.
Return the chicken to the pan with the seasoning and water. Cook over a low heat for 1 hour or until tender.
Stir the cornflour mixture into the sauce. Cook for 2-3 min until thickened slightly.
Adjust seasoning to taste. Spoon into a warmed serving dish.

title: Fried chicken in West Indian sauce
